Battleship

Rules

  • Drag the ships at the bottom to your board. Click on a ship to change directions! If you want to reset your board, simply click the "Reset" button at the bottom.
  • For maximum enjoyment, wait until the AI finishes attacking before playing.
  • The objective of Battleship is to try and sink all of the opponent's ships before they sink all of yours. Players take turns firing shots to attempt to hit the enemy ships.
  • Both players can not see the fleet of the other, you have to guess where is the ideal position to shoot at!
  • When a player hits a tile that holds a ship, they can replay until they miss a shot.
  • First player to sink all the opponent's ships wins the game!
  • Each player has 8 ships in total!
